title: 5 Useful Evernote Tips & Tricks
description:
Here are some tips and tricks on how to use Evernote effectively.

[Video Content]

#1 Change your default formatting 0:30
#2 Send emails 1:50
#3 Evernote web clipper 3:29
#4 Secure your Evernote 4:53
#5 Backup Evernote 6:36
